text: The 2007 Individual Speedway European Championship was a speedway competition consisting of three qualifying rounds, three semi-final rounds, and a final round. The final, held on 29 September in Wiener Neustadt, was won by Jurica Pavlic of Croatia. ==Final standing== # Gold Jurica Pavlic (Croatia) # Silver Sebastian Ułamek (Poland) # Bronze Patrick Hougaard
